rules_text:
Double strike, vigilance
[i]Od's Descendant[/i] – Whenever a creature you control with base power 2 or less dies, put X +1/+1 counters onto target creature you control, where X is that creature's power.
[i]Seliph's Master[/i] – At the beginning of combat on your turn, creatures you control with base power 2 or less gain double strike and training until end of turn. [i](Whenever this creature attacks with another creature with greater power, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.)[/i]
